alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 8:13PM EST until March 07 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sullivan County in central New York... Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 845 PM EST. * At 812 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Willowemoc to near Skytop, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Bushkill, Monticello, Lackawaxen, Liberty, Bethel, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Shohola and Matamoras. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
